item.title: Azure Application Gateway protection against CVE-2025-8671 (MadeYouReset)
item.description: A new HTTP/2 vulnerability, CVE-2025-8671 (MadeYouReset), was recently disclosed on August 13, 2025. This attack leverages carefully crafted protocol frames to force servers into repeatedly resetting streams on a single connection, which can lead to high resource consumption and denial of service (DoS) in extreme cases. MadeYouReset and Rapid Reset (CVE-2023-44487) are two similar attack patterns exploiting HTTP/2 steam resets feature leading to resource exhaustion. Stronger Defense with Azure Application Gateway If you are using Azure Application Gateway, you are already protected again...
